parameterdescription.para: points to nchannels float values. These are the values for each channel at this sample time.

briefdescription.para: guts of oscilloscope trigger and buffer module

detaileddescription.para: This module processes sets of samples provided the process_sample method. When appropriate given the updateRate, sampleRate and trigger conditions, process_sample will periodically write output records of captured data to output_fd. For each trigger event, nchannels records will be written. Each record consists of get_samples_per_output_record binary floats. The trigger instant occurs at the 1/2 way point in the buffer. Thus, output records consist of 50% pre-trigger data and 50% post-trigger data.
